foundationday000.name: Foundation Day
foundationday000.description: Absalom's celebration of both its founding and the new year.

longnight0000000.name: Longnight
longnight0000000.description: Revelers stay awake through the longest winter night to defy the darkness and greet the dawn.

merrymead0000000.name: Merrymead
merrymead0000000.description: A celebration of approaching spring where the previous year's alcohol is consumed.

leapday000000000.name: Leap Day
leapday000000000.description: Followers of Mahathallah mark this rare day as Fateless Day, a time outside normal fate.

dayofbones000000.name: Day of Bones
dayofbones000000.description: A solemn holiday honoring Pharasma where the dead are remembered and tombs are tended.

firstbloom000000.name: Firstbloom
firstbloom000000.description: Fertility dances celebrate the coming of spring at the vernal equinox.

plantingweek0000.name: Planting Week
plantingweek0000.description: A holy week dedicated to Erastil when farmers engage in heavy field work.

taxfest000000000.name: Taxfest
taxfest000000000.description: Priests of Abadar accompany tax collectors to ensure fair taxation, followed by a feast.

remembrancemoon0.name: Remembrance Moon
remembrancemoon0.description: A solemn holiday honoring those who fell in the Shining Crusade against the Whispering Tyrant.

sunwroughtfestiv.name: Sunwrought Festival
sunwroughtfestiv.description: The summer solstice honors Sarenrae with fireworks and reenactments of her battle with Rovagug.

burningblades000.name: Burning Blades
burningblades000.description: A festival for Sarenrae culminating in sacred dances performed with flaming blades.

archersday000000.name: Archer's Day
archersday000000.description: Erastil's holy day celebrated with archery contests and livestock bartering.

armasse000000000.name: Armasse
armasse000000000.description: A day to train commoners in combat, honoring Iomedae's martial legacy.

swallowtailfesti.name: Swallowtail Festival
swallowtailfesti.description: The first day of autumn honors Desna with feasting and the release of butterflies.

harvestfeast0000.name: Harvest Feast
harvestfeast0000.description: The autumnal equinox celebration marks the harvest's end.

ascendanceday000.name: Ascendance Day
ascendanceday000.description: Iomedae's divine ascension is celebrated with ceremonies honoring her rise to goddess.

jestercap0000000.name: Jestercap
jestercap0000000.description: A day of pranks and practical jokes particularly favored by gnomes.

sevenveils000000.name: Seven Veils
sevenveils000000.description: Sivanah's sacred masquerade ball where participants disguise their identity behind magical veils.

winterweek000000.name: Winter Week
winterweek000000.description: A traditional feast serving as a time for courting and gathering with friends.

candlemark000000.name: Candlemark
candlemark000000.description: The winter solstice honors Sarenrae's healing power on the sun's weakest day.

crystalhue000000.name: Crystalhue
crystalhue000000.description: A winter solstice celebration of art and courtship honoring Shelyn with crystal prisms.

nightofthepale00.name: Night of the Pale
nightofthepale00.description: The last night of the year when ghosts of the recently dead manifest to visit their former homes.
